repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: According to the note of V Raghavan, this is a manuscript of Anantadharmasaṃgraha. Looks like it is a collectiomn of various views from the varius Dharma literature. The Published text is available only in Telugu. The paper note mentions that the manuscript is of śūdrakasmṛti Dharma , Granth, 510 pages 7 L. Raghavan has added a correction note indicating that this text is of Anantadharmasagraha.

msItem.title: Anantadharmasaṃgraha
msItem.incipit: [1v ]1 [a few broken syllables as folio is damaged] tocyate . āntra manuḥ dharmaṃśanaissancinuyāt valmikamivamukti [ka?] paralokasahāyārthaṃ sarvabhutānyavidhāyatu. [1 illegible syllable] yaḥ prasūyate jantureka eva [1v 2] [a few broken syllables as folio is damaged] pramīyate . ekonubhuṅkte sukṛtaṃ ekaṃ [illegible syllables] ca duṣkṛtaṃ .
msItem.explicit: xv 6 [2 illegible syllables] arogāṃ strīyamupeyāt . .. tatra tāmbūlabhakṣaṇaṃ parṇa [illegible one syllable] bale bhavet [illegible one syllable] dhīḥ parṇāṃśe pāpa [loss of text as rest of the folio is broken.]

support.p: Thick wooden covers, looks newer than the manuscript. Given the fragility of the manuscript folio, it was probably used to safeguard them.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio,2 blank folio, 270 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numeration in the left margin.

TEI.text:
[1v ]1 [a few broken syllables as folio is damaged] tocyate . āntra manuḥ dharmaṃśanaissancinuyāt valmikamivamukti [ka?] paralokasahāyārthaṃ sarvabhutānyavidhāyatu. [1 illegible syllable] yaḥ prasūyate jantureka eva [1v 2] [a few broken syllables as folio is damaged] pramīyate . ekonubhuṅkte sukṛtaṃ ekaṃ [illegible syllables] ca duṣkṛtaṃ .
xv 6 [2 illegible syllables] arogāṃ strīyamupeyāt . .. tatra tāmbūlabhakṣaṇaṃ parṇa [illegible one syllable] bale bhavet [illegible one syllable] dhīḥ parṇāṃśe pāpa [loss of text as rest of the folio is broken.]
